title: Gradle
desc: Stay ahead of the curve by building your projects with the newest and most advanced Gradle build system.

title: Code editor
desc: Upgrade your coding game with our IDE's smart code editor that offers code completions, actions, and analysis to help you write better code quickly.

title: Studio Project Support
desc: Effortlessly build Android Studio projects in AndroidIDE without any modifications - making your development process smoother and more streamlined!

title: Terminal
desc: Seamlessly access a full Linux environment with AndroidIDE's built-in terminal, based on the powerful Termux project.

title: AAB Support
desc: Make your app available to millions of users by effortlessly exporting it as AAB files and publishing it on the Play store!

title: Open Source
desc: Explore endless innovation possibilities with our open-source project, where transparency and collaboration are key!
